#classify homofam
classified_df <- gma_pvu_count %>%
  mutate(Fam_class = case_when(
    diff_gma_pvu < 0 ~ "loss",
    diff_gma_pvu == 0 ~ "neutral",
    diff_gma_pvu >= 1 ~ "gain",
    TRUE ~ NA_character_  # Handle other cases if needed
  ))
